definitions.body: widow (Mish. id., As. almattu Dl in Zim:BP 114)—´[[א]] Ge 38:11 +; no cstr.; pl. [[אַלְמָנוֹת]] Ex 22:23 +; pl. sf. [[אַלְמְנוֹתָיו]] Job 27:18, etc.—widow 1Ki 17:20; ´[[אִשָּׁה אַ]] 2Sa 14:5 (‖[[וַיׇּ֫מָת אִישִׁי]]) 1Ki 7:14, 1Ki 11:26, 1Ki 17:9, 1Ki 17:10; Ge 38:11 (J; living in father's house) cf. Le 22:13 (H; ‖[[גְּרוּשָׁה]]); Le 21:14 (H), where widow forbidden as wife of h. p., like [[גְּרוּשָׁה]], [[חֲלָלָה]], [[זׁנׇה]] cf. Ez Eze 44:22, Eze 44:22, Eze 44:22 (id. of all priests, exc. widow of priest); Nu 30:10 (P; of widow's vow, ‖[[גְּרוּשָׁה ]]); [[נְשֵׁיכֶם אַלְמָנוֹת]] = ye shall be slain Ex 22:23 (‖[[בְּנֵיכֶם]] [[יְתׂמִים]]) cf. Ps 109:9, Je 15:8, Je 18:21, Ez Eze 22:25, also La 5:3; (sim.); of those snatched away by pestilence [[אַלְמְנוֹתָיו לאׁ תִבְכֶּינׇה]] Job 27:15; by sword, id., Ps 78:64; LXX We rd. [[אַלְמָנוֹת חַיּוֹת]] 2Sa 20:3 (v. [[אַלְמָנוּת]] infr.) of imprisoned concubines; fig. of Jerusalem La 1:1; Babylon Is 47:8; esp. widow as helpless, exposed to oppression & harsh treatment (oft. ‖[[יׇתוֹם]], & [[גֵּר]]); Is 1:23, Is 10:2, Job 22:9, Job 24:3, Job 31:16, Ps 94:6, Mal 3:5; harshness forbidden, & care for them enjoined Ex 22:21 (E) De 14:29, De 16:11, De 16:14, De 24:17, De 24:19, De 24:20, De 24:21, De 26:12, De 26:13, De 27:19, Is 1:17, Je 7:6, Je 22:3, Zec 7:10, cf. Job 29:13; under esp. care of God De 10:18, Je 49:11, Pr 15:25, Ps 68:6, Ps 146:9; once of severity of judgment in not sparing widow Is 9:16. (´[[אַל]] Is 13:22 vid. sub [[אַרְמוֹן]]; Ez Eze 19:7 vid. ib. & also sub [[מעון]].)
